suggestion:
Meal Suggestion:
Grilled Paneer and Vegetable Lettuce Wraps

Description:
This low-carb vegetarian meal is perfect for Luca's goal of losing weight. It combines the protein-rich paneer with fresh vegetables, all wrapped in crisp lettuce leaves. This dish is designed to be light yet filling, offering a delicious twist on traditional wraps without the carbs from bread.

Main Ingredients:
1. 200 grams of paneer (cubed)
2. 2 cups of mixed bell peppers (sliced thin)
3. 1 cup of cucumbers (julienned)
4. 1 cup of cherry tomatoes (halved)
5. 2 tablespoons of olive oil
6. 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika
7. 1 teaspoon of garlic powder
8. 1 teaspoon of onion powder
9. 1 tablespoon of lemon juice
10. Salt to taste
11. Freshly ground black pepper to taste
12. 8 large lettuce leaves (for wrapping)
13
